item.title: Markdown snippet for Hugo post
item.description: The solutions are mainly derived from Yihui’s JS library. Code By using: ` ` `r a <- 1 + 1 ... ` ` ` produces: a = 1 + 1 ... MathJax Solution: Add math-code.js. to static/js/. Add the following lines to layouts/partials/footer_section.html. <!-- 加入MathJax, 用于Markdown中输入数学公
